message.titleText: Is your current service Optus Sport ready?
message.subtitleText: Optus is offering a range of mobile, mobile broadband and home broadband plans that are eligible for Optus Sport access.
message.titleInitial: You can check the eligibility of each existing service you hold below:
message.subtitleInitial: NOT AN OPTUS CUSTOMER? Check out the range of plans with Optus Sport access

message.mbbtInputLabel: Mobile Broadband Service Number or Order Number

message.codeSentText: The code is vaild for the next 10 minutes.

validationMessage.serviceidRequired: Please enter Username or Account Number or homephone Number
validationMessage.invalidDob: Please enter valid date of birth

broadband.header: There are a few methods we use to retrieve your account information.
broadband.content:
You can use an area code + landline number, or your Internet Username. (The Internet Username is the name before @optusnet in your email address - it was created when you first registered with us.)

If you've forgotten your Username, call Customer Care on 133 937.

mobileBroadband.content: You can find your mobile broadband Service Number under service charges on your bills.

labels.label: Postpaid mobile
Mobile Broadband and Tablet

options.label: Order Number for new Optus mobile

faq.title: Nitty Gritty
faq.content: Optus Sport is available for personal viewing in Australia only on selected plans. Content varies by device.

errors.already_registered:
There is already an Optus Sport subscription associated with this Optus service.

You can log into your Optus Sport account, or try again with a different Optus service.
errors.SESSION_EXPIRED:
Your session has expired.

You can try again via your Optus Sport welcome email, or restart the session.
errors.SERVER_IS_BUSY:
We've encountered a problem, and we're working to rectify it as soon as possible.

Please try again later.
errors.JWT_TOKEN_TIMEOUT:
Your session has expired.

Please try again through My Account or My Optus app.

errors.RECORD_NOT_FOUND: We can’t find an Optus service associated with these details.
errors.USER_MULTIPLE_VALIDATION_ERRORS: We don’t recognise the login details you’ve provided. Please check your details and try again.
errors.EPL_ERR_007: The login details you’ve provided are already associated with another service; please transfer or cancel your subscription to proceed.

included.text: Eligible for a subscription at no additional cost.

added.titleAdded: Your plan is eligible for an Optus Sport Subscription, priced at $15 per month.
added.subtitleAdded: The subscription continues on a month-to-month basis, and you can cancel any time.
added.termsandconditions: I confirm that I have read the terms and conditions and the privacy policy
added.bottomTitleAdded: Add Optus Sport to your plan
added.contentText:
You will enjoy:

  • Every match of the Premier League, exclusively live
  • Access to the Optus Sport app for smartphones and tablets
  • Premier League player stats, tables, results and fixtures
  • Cricket content, including exclusive extended highlights, fixtures, results, match analysis and more

not_eligible.subText: You may be able to change your plan to get Optus Sport.
not_eligible.contentText:
Current plan not eligible

Unfortunately, your current plan is not eligible for Optus Sport.

If you would like to change this plan to one that is eligible for Optus Sport access, simply head to the Optus store online and we'll help you find a great eligible plan.

Check eligibility of another service

already_registered.accessDate: You have access to Optus Sport until
already_registered.login: You must create a login to gain access.
already_registered.createLogin: No log in associated with this service. Click 'Manage' to create one.

prepaid.text: Your prepaid service is not eligible for Optus Sport access
prepaid.contentText:
Current plan not eligible

Unfortunately, your current plan is not eligible for Optus Sport.

If you would like to change this plan to the one that is eligible for Optus Sport, simply head to the Optus store online and we'll help you find a great plan. Remember - an Optus Sport subscription is included at no extra cost on eligible plans $85 and above.

Check eligibility of another service

registration.textWhenBelowThreshold:
Great News.

An Optus Sport subscription has been added to your account.

The only thing remaining is for you to create your Optus Sport login details below.
registration.textWhenAboveThreshold:
Great News.

An Optus Sport subscription is included at no extra charge.

Your current service has an Optus Sport subscription included at no extra charge.
The subscription starts immediately, and you can cancel at any time.

You will enjoy:

  • Every match of the Premier League, exclusively live
  • Access to the Optus Sport app for smartphones and tablets
  • Premier League player stats, tables, results and fixtures
  • Cricket content, including exclusive extended highlights, fixtures, results, match analysis and more

The only thing remaining is for you to create your Optus Sport login below.

modalTextObj.inUseText: The username is already in use
modalTextObj.modalTextOnCancelled: The username is in use with a cancelled [plan name] service that expires on [date]
modalTextObj.newServiceInfoText: Would you like to transfer the login to the new service?
modalTextObj.transferLoginInfoText: By selecting "yes, transfer login", it will no longer be linked to your [plan name]

TextByServiceType.MOB:
Want the big screen experience for Optus Sport?

Optus mobile customers can get closer to the action on their big screen with Yes TV by Fetch Mini, Apple TV or Chromecast. Yes TV by Fetch Mini is available for use over a fixed internet connection only (Data charges will apply from your internet service provider) and additional charges of $5 per month apply.

Add Yes TV by Fetch Mini
TextByServiceType.BB:
Are you a home broadband customer?

Want the big screen experience for Optus Sport?

Add Yes TV by Fetch

Optus home broadband customers can get closer to the action on their big screen with Yes TV by Fetch (additional charges may apply) or using Apple TV and Chromecast.
TextByServiceType.ERROR:
Want the big screen experience for Optus Sport?

Optus mobile broadband customers can get closer to the action on their big screen with an Apple TV or Chromecast device. Alternatively, you can add a new Optus postpaid mobile phone or fixed broadband plan to your account, and take advantage of a range of Yes TV by Fetch products.

Add Yes TV by Fetch Mini

registration.contentText:
Great news.

Optus Sport is included at no extra charge.

Your current service has an Optus Sport subscription included at no extra charge.
The subscription starts immediately, and you can cancel at any time.

You will enjoy:

  • All 380 matches exclusively live, highlights and match replays
  • The new Optus Premier League app for smartphones and tablets
  • Up-to-the-minute player stats, league tables and fixtures

The only thing remaining is for you to create your Premier League login details below.
registration.bottomHtmlContent:
Here's how you can start watching the amazing sporting action on Optus Sport:

Click here to start watching on the website.

Remember to reset your set top box for the Optus Sport channels to appear.

Click here to find out about supported devices and browsers.
registration.termsAndConditionsLabel: The full Terms and Conditions can be viewed here. You can also review our Privacy Policy.
registration.termsText: As a term and condition of subscribing to Optus Sport, Optus will from time to time send you marketing messages which we feel may be of interest. You can manage your marketing preference at any time by going to optus.com.au/intouch.
registration.registrationSuccessText:
You’re ready

You’re now subscribed to Optus Sport.

START WATCHING
registration.verificationResentText:
We've resent your verification email.

Your Optus Sport verification email has been resent to

Please click on the link in the email to verfify and complete your account creation.

You will be taken to the login page - simply enter your details to log in and begin your Optus Sport experience.

Resend verification email

cancelSubscription.title: Cancel subscription
cancelSubscription.subtitle: Please confirm the cancellation of this subscription.
cancelSubscription.message:
This cancellation will occur at the start of your next billing cycle on [expiryDate].
Untill then, you will have access to Optus Sport.
cancelSubscription.note: Please note: Cancelling your Optus Sport subscription will not cancel any Fetch products associated with your service.

changeEmail.subTitle: Change the email address you use when logging into Optus Sport
changeEmail.notification: We just sent a notification email to the Optus Account holder.
changeEmail.loginMessage: From now on, log in to Optus Sport using
changeEmail.successMessage: The email address was changed successfully.
